Module main.software2
Package helper

Class TimezoneConversions

java.lang.Object
helper.TimezoneConversions
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddAppointmentController, AppointmentTimes, UpdateAppointmentController
public class TimezoneConversions extends Object
This class provides logic for Timezone conversions used throughout the project

    estConversion(LocalDateTime myLDT)

    This method returns the current LocalTime according to the system's zone Id

    toZonedLocalTimeConversion(LocalDateTime zdt)
    This method takes in a LocalDateTime object and converts it into a zoneddatetime object on the system's zone Id for use in other helper methods

  • Method Details

    • estConversion

      public static boolean estConversion(LocalDateTime myLDT)
      This method takes in a LocalDateTime object, converts it into est, and returns a boolean value if it lies between the organization's start and end times
      Parameters:
      myLDT - localdatetime entered
      Returns:
      boolean value if time is within company hours

    • toZonedLocalTimeConversion

      public static ZonedDateTime toZonedLocalTimeConversion(LocalDateTime zdt)
      This method takes in a LocalDateTime object and converts it into a zoneddatetime object on the system's zone Id for use in other helper methods
      Parameters:
      zdt - the localdatetime
      Returns:
      the zoned date time converted

    • toLocalTimeConversion

      public static LocalTime toLocalTimeConversion(LocalDateTime ldt)
      This method takes in a LocalDateTime object, converts it into a zoned date time object on the system's zone Id, and returns a LocalTime object version of it
      Parameters:
      ldt - the localdatetime
      Returns:
      the converted localtime

    • getCurrentTime

      public static LocalTime getCurrentTime()
      This method returns the current LocalTime according to the system's zone Id
      Returns:
      localtime in system's zone Id
